about_the_game:
Experiment and create your beloved Tiny House!
No pressure, no lock, just chill!

Currently:
  • 17 floors
  • 18 walls
  • 13 furniture
  • 7 appliances
  • 18 objets

Share your new ideas to add to the project (that helps me a lot) and share your beloved Tiny House. I would like to see your creations :)
We will be updating this project weekly by fixing code and adding new assets.
detailed_description:
Experiment and create your beloved Tiny House!
No pressure, no lock, just chill!

Currently:
  • 17 floors
  • 18 walls
  • 13 furniture
  • 7 appliances
  • 18 objets

Share your new ideas to add to the project (that helps me a lot) and share your beloved Tiny House. I would like to see your creations :)
We will be updating this project weekly by fixing code and adding new assets.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS/Manjaro KDE 18.1.4 Juhraya/Linux Mint 19.3
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.5 - 10.11.6 or lower
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Tiny House!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7-8-10-11
  • Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 and/or OpenGL 3.3 compatible video card
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Experiment and create your beloved Tiny House! No pressure, no lock, just chill!
